channel.title: Juzeh's List of Programs (Read the first paragraph)
channel.description:
[center][b][size=14pt]JuzEh's 'List of Programs'[/b][/center] [left]I posted this on MS forums, but casey` told me to try and post it here, sooo I may as well post it here and not let it go to waste. I'm probably gonna get attacked over posting this by people saying 'gah this is already been posted, fk off n00b', but I hope people on this forum aren't as retarded as [b]SOME[/b] of the people on the MS forums. I made this list from pure boredom and I thought I could help some people by posting this. This took 1 and a half hours to gather and put all the information together. I hope this helps :):|.[/left]
[center][b]Also, some of these programs may need a crack to be used.[/center]
[left][b][u]Anti-virus/Firewall Programs[/u][/b] - Needed if you want your computer too be safe. (A must)
Avast! Antivirus - [url=http://www.avast.com]Download[/url] AdAware - [url=http://www.lavasoft.de/products/ad-aware_se_personal.php]Download[/url] AVG Anitvirus - [url=http://www.grisoft.com/us.homepage]Download[/url] Spybot S&D - [url=http://www.safer-networking.org/en/download/index.html]Download[/url] Comodo Firewall - [url=http://www.personalfirewall.comodo.com/]Download[/url] Kaspersky (30 Day Trial) - [url=http://klacampaign.kaspersky.com.au/front.aspx?campaign=go01]Download[/url] Norton Antivirus (Not sure) - [url=http://symantec-norton.com/Norton_Antivirus_2008_p1.aspx?lang=en-AU&par=goo_au_norton_antivirus&gclid=CLPlp6mwzpUCFQ89awodUyKLjQ]Download[/url] McAfee (Not sure) - [url=http://au.mcafee.com/en-au/landingpages/13190.asp?PPCid=semd|ggl|au_MA_Branded_en|w1C9CD65|s&s_kwcid=.mcafee|1966284517]Download[/url] ZoneAlarm (Good if you have a crack - Pretty sure anyway) [url=http://www.zonealarm.com/store/content/home.jsp]Download[/url] Kerio - [url=http://www.kerio.com/kpf_home.html]Download[/url] Outpost Firewall - [url=http://www.agnitum.com/download/outpost1.html]Download[/url] Sygate - [url=http://smb.sygate.com/products/spf_standard.htm]Download[/url] SpywareBlaster - [url=http://www.javacoolsoftware.com/spywareblaster.html]Download[/url] SpywareGuard - [url=http://www.wilderssecurity.net/spywareguard.html]Download[/url]
[b][u]Chat Programs[/u][/b] - If you want to chat with other people, eg. MSN. (Optional)
AOL Instant Messenger (AIM) - [url=http://info.aol.co.uk/aim/]Download[/url] Windows Live Messenger (MSN) - [url=http://get.live.com/messenger/features]Download[/url] Miranda Instant Messenger - (Client that supports most chat) - [url=http://www.miranda-im.org/]Download[/url] mIRC - [url=http://www.mIRC.com]Download[/url] Popular mIRC Plug-in: [url=http://www.nnscript.com]NNScript[/url] GAIM - Supports every chat - [url=http://gaim.sourceforge.net/]Download[/url] SKYPE - [url=http://www.Skype.com.au]Download[/url] ICQ? - [url=http://www.icq.com/]Download[/url] Pandion - [url=http://www.pandion.be/]Download[/url] PSI - [url=http://psi.affinix.com/]Download[/url] SIM - [url=http://sim-icq.sourceforge.net/]Download[/url] Trillian Basic - [url=http://trillian.cc/downloads]Download[/url]
[b][u][color=black]Music Players[/u][/b] - Programs that play music.
WinAmp - [url=http://www.winamp.com]Download[/url] iTunes - [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]Download[/url] Songbird - [url=http://www.songbirdnest.com]Download[/url] DeliPlayer - [url=http://www.deliplayer.com/]Download[/url] CoolPlayer - [url=http://coolplayer.sourceforge.net/]Download[/url]
[b][u][color=black]Photo & Graphics Programs[/u][/b] - These are programs that you are able to design and edit logos, pictures etc. (Some of these [b]WILL[/b] need cracks)
Adobe Photoshop - [url=http://www.adobe.com/go/tryphotoshop_ap]Download[/url] - Blender 3D - [url=http://www.blender.org/]Download[/url] GIMP - [url=http://www.gimp.org/downloads/]Download[/url] OpenFX - [url=http://www.openfx.or]Download[/url] SoftImage XSI - [url=http://www.softimage.com/products/exp/v3/]Download[/url] Toxic - [url=http://www.toxicengine.org/]Download[/url] Wings 3D - [url=http://www.wings3d.com/]Download[/url]
[b][u]Internet Browsers - Different browsers to search the internet with, they may come with more addons/features. (Optional)
Firefox - [url=http://www.firefox.com]Download[/url] Google Chrome - [url=http://www.google.com/chrome]Download[/url] Opera 9.52 - [url=http://www.opera.com/]Download[/url] Maxthon - [url=http://www.maxthon.com/]Download[/url] Safari - [url=http://www.apple.com/safari/]Download[/url]
[b][u]Torrenting Programs[/u][/b] - Torrent is a small file (around few kilobytes) with the suffix .torrent, which contains all the information needed to download a file the torrent was made for. That means it contains file names, their sizes, where to download from and so on. You can get torrents for almost anything on lots of web sites and torrent. (Recommended)
BitTorrent - [url=http://www.bittorent.com]Download[/url] uTorrent [url=http://www.uTorrent.com]Download[/url] Vuze / Azureus - [url=http://www.vuze.com]Download[/url]
[b][u]Torrent Sites[/u][/b]
http://mininova.org http://bittorrent.com http://demonoid.com http://isoHunt.com http://bitsoup.org http://www.bitenova.org/ http://www.youtorrent.com/ http://www.torrentspy.com/ http://www.torrentportal.com/ http://thepiratebay.org/
[b]The next few programs I'll be posting will come with a description so you have a better idea of what your downloading.[/b]
[b][u]Miscenallous Programs[/b] - Random programs that could be used if wanted :) (Optional)
Notepad++ - [url=http://notepad-plus.sourceforge.net/uk/site.htm]Download[/url] A small and simple program allows you to write any kind of code. (Fixed mistake, hopefully... :P)
CCleaner - [url=http://www.ccleaner.com/download/]Download[/url] A program that deletes unused temp files, registery entries from Windows.
LimeWire Free Version - Able to upgrade to PRO - [url=http://www.limewire.com/]Download[/url] LimeWire is a free file sharing program for Windows, Mac, OSX, Linux.
FrostWire - [url=http://www.frostwire.com]Download[/url] Similar to LimeWire.
WinRAR - [url=http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm]Download[/url] WinRAR provides RAR and ZIP file support.
Google Earth - [url=http://earth.google.com/]Download[/url] Google Earth allows you to see around the world with satellite images. They have updated there service and you can now go to Street View!
Daemon! Lite - [url=http://www.daemon-tools.cc/dtcc/announcements.php]Download[/url] DAEMON Tools is an advanced application for Microsoft Windows which provides the best optical media emulation in the industry.
BearShare - [url=http://download.bearshare.com/BSINSTALL.exe]Download[/url] Similiar to Frostwire/LimeWire
If you feel like I have missed out anything, please tell me.
Sorry that I couldn't put more in the Misc part, but I got a bit lazy :P! But thats all I can think of right now. I hope you enjoyed this list and it comes to use.
Thanks, JuzEh`[/left]

[center][size=14pt]JuzEh’s ‘List of Programs’[/center]
[left]I posted this on MS forums, but casey` told me to try and post it here, sooo I may as well post it here and not let it go to waste. I’m probably gonna get attacked over posting this by people saying ‘gah this is already been posted, fk off n00b’, but I hope people on this forum aren’t as retarded as SOME of the people on the MS forums. I made this list from pure boredom and I thought I could help some people by posting this. This took 1 and a half hours to gather and put all the information together. I hope this helps :):|.[/left]

[center][b]Also, some of these programs may need a crack to be used.[/center]

[left]Anti-virus/Firewall Programs - Needed if you want your computer too be safe. (A must)

Avast! Antivirus - Download
AdAware - Download
AVG Anitvirus - Download

Comodo Firewall - Download
Kaspersky (30 Day Trial) - Download
Norton Antivirus (Not sure) - Download
McAfee (Not sure) - Download
ZoneAlarm (Good if you have a crack - Pretty sure anyway) Download
Kerio - Download

SpywareBlaster - Download

AOL Instant Messenger (AIM) - Download
Windows Live Messenger (MSN) - Download
Miranda Instant Messenger - (Client that supports most chat) - Download
mIRC - Download
Popular mIRC Plug-in: NNScript
GAIM - Supports every chat - Download
SKYPE - Download

Pandion - Download
PSI - Download

DeliPlayer - Download
CoolPlayer - Download

[color=black]Photo & Graphics Programs - These are programs that you are able to design and edit logos, pictures etc. (Some of these WILL need cracks)

Adobe Photoshop - Download -
Blender 3D - Download
GIMP - Download
OpenFX - Download
SoftImage XSI - Download
Toxic - Download

[b][u]Internet Browsers - Different browsers to search the internet with, they may come with more addons/features. (Optional)

Firefox - Download
Google Chrome - Download
Opera 9.52 - Download
Maxthon - Download
Safari - Download

Torrenting Programs - Torrent is a small file (around few kilobytes) with the suffix .torrent, which contains all the information needed to download a file the torrent was made for. That means it contains file names, their sizes, where to download from and so on. You can get torrents for almost anything on lots of web sites and torrent. (Recommended)

BitTorrent - Download
uTorrent Download
Vuze / Azureus - Download

Torrent Sites

http://mininova.org

bittorrent.com

BitTorrent

BitTorrent is a leading software company with the fastest torrent client and sync and share software for Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS and Android.


http://demonoid.com

The next few programs I’ll be posting will come with a description so you have a better idea of what your downloading.

[u]Miscenallous Programs - Random programs that could be used if wanted (Optional)

A small and simple program allows you to write any kind of code. (Fixed mistake, hopefully… :P)

WinRAR provides RAR and ZIP file support.

Similiar to Frostwire/LimeWire

If you feel like I have missed out anything, please tell me.

Sorry that I couldn’t put more in the Misc part, but I got a bit lazy :P! But thats all I can think of right now. I hope you enjoyed this list and it comes to use.
